forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 21C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
